item.title: Upa Lokayukta orders to file two suo-motu cases
item.description: <![CDATA[Pic: Upa Lokayukta B Veerappa interacts with a farmer during his visit to Raichur APMCRaichur: Upa Lokayukta B Veerappa commenced a three-day tour of the district on Thursday and visited the APMC. The Upa Lokayukta, who will continue his tour until Saturday, plans to make unannounced visits to various locations and gather complaints from the public. Additionally, he will take part in a legal literacy programme concerning the Karnataka Lokayukta Act, which will be conducted in collaboration with ...]]>
